Package bankteller.demo1

Class Date

java.lang.Object
bankteller.demo1.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
This class represents a date containing the month, day, and year. Dates are formatted as "mm/ddd/yyyy".
Author:
Afsana Rahman, Mini Sinha

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks if date is a possible calendar date.
      Returns:
      true if valid calendar date, false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Creates a new string containing the date.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String form of date in "mm/dd/yyyy" format

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date date)
      Compares this date with specified date.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      date - another date that is being compared to this instance's date
      Returns:
      negative if instance date is earlier, positive if later, zero if same date

    • validDayForMonth

      private boolean validDayForMonth()
      Helper method that checks if this date is on a valid day in given month.
      Returns:
      true if date is possible, false if not possible

    • leapYear

      private boolean leapYear()
      Helper method that checks if given year is a leap year. A year is a leap year if it is divisible by 400, or divisible by 4 and not 100.
      Returns:
      true if leap year, false otherwise
